headline: Is It Time To Reassess PPL (PPL) After Recent Price Swings?
summary: If you are wondering whether PPL at around US$35.13 is offering fair value right now or if you are paying up for its recent track record, this article walks through what the numbers are actually saying. The stock has had mixed short term moves, with a 4.3% decline over the last 7 days, a 1.0% gain over 30 days, and returns of 0.1% year to date, while sitting on 6.9% over 1 year, 37.3% over 3 years, and 51.7% over 5 years. Recent coverage around PPL has focused on its position in the US...
